Cheba Zahouania (Arabic: الشابة الزهوانية ) (nke a na-akpọkwa Chaba), a mụrụ Halima Mazzi (Arabic: حليمة مازي) (amụrụ na Mee 15, 1959) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Algeria nke a maara maka egwu raï
Ọ bi na France kemgbe e gburu onye ya na ya na-abụ abụ, Cheb Hasni, na 1994.
A mụrụ Halima Mazzi na Oran, Algeria site n'aka nna onye Morocco na nne onye Algeria, na 1959

N'okpuru aha Chaba Zahouania, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama nke raï, ụdị egwu ọdịnala. N'afọ 1986, afọ ise mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ya, ọ nwetara nkwado site na arụmọrụ ya nke "Khâli ya khâli" (Nwanne nna m, oh, nwanne nna m) na Cheb Hamid.

N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1987, Zahouania dekọrọ "Beraka" ("The Shack"), ya na Cheb Hasni, nke ụkpụrụ Algeria weere dị ka ihe na-akpasụ iwe, nke dọtara uche ha. Ihe ịga nke ọma nke abụ ahụ mere ka Hasni bụrụ onye a ma ama ma gbakwunye na íwú ewu Zahouania, ọ bụ ezie na abụ ahụ nọgidere na-ese okwu n'ihi ndị nkatọ na ndị Alakụba, bụ ndị na-echegbu onwe ha banyere iwu ewu nke ụdị raï.
E gburu Hasni na Oran na 29 Septemba 1994
Zahouania hapụrụ Algeria wee gaa biri na France
O nwere ike ịlaghachi na 1999 wee dekọọ na Algeria, gụnyere egwu ya na Cheb Abdou
N'afọ 2006, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ banyere isiokwu okpukpe mgbe Onye isi ala Abdelaziz Bouteflika kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Mecca na njem ala nsọ mbụ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ masịghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ya na ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwú raï sonyeere iji mepụta kọmitii nkwado maka Abdelaziz Bouteflika na 2009.
